alert.note: Alert for East Sweetwater County; Flaming Gorge; Rock Springs and Green River; South Lincoln County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued December 20 at 2:18AM MST until December 21 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING THROUGH WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...South Lincoln County, Rock Springs and Green River, Flaming Gorge and East Sweetwater County. * WHEN...From Wednesday morning through Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Dangerous crosswinds are expected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Possible high winds will be accompanied by a period of snow Wednesday afternoon that will bring sharply reduced visibility in blowing snow.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: East Sweetwater County; Flaming Gorge; Rock Springs and Green River; South Lincoln County
